data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Coquimbo
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Coquimbo, Chile
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Coquimbo, Chile to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary: On average, 67 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Coquimbo, Chile.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, show your mercy on the 529,463 people in Coquimbo who are far from you. Please add 137 new house churches this year.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Coquimbo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, Spanish-speaking people.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Coquimbo, Chile.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 158,337 believers in the state of Coquimbo into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Coquimbo, Chile the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

location.name: Coquimbo
